name: Sashimi Train
description:
** Play in the browser does not work for now. So sorry!**

Developed by Consc (Costas) and ysong (You Jin)

Sashimi Train is all about placing the sashimi you are holding on top of the cat rice pieces while avoiding the rat wasabi pieces to earn points. 

You have 10 seconds to do so every time you play so drop your sashimi wisely! Let's see who is a sushi master!

How to play:

Simply click the left mouse button whenever you want to drop a sashimi piece onto something. Every cat rice counts as 10 points and rat wasabi as -10 points!
